name: LAST WAR 2044
description:
LAST WAR 2044

is a unique world that survived a nuclear war. In this world you are given the opportunity to fight for survival against monsters. Also, a large number of weapons will be given (from a pistol to a minigun). In addition, there is the opportunity to build turrets. In this game, you have a choice how to defend the fortress with the weapons available in the arsenal, and build powerful turrets that can repel stronger mutants.
